title: Behind The Idea #70: Kinder Morgan And DCF 2.0
description: We take a last bite at the apple with another discussion on Kinder Morgan. Seeking Alpha author Dividend Streamer, who has focused on Kinder Morgan in his Seeking Alpha time, discusses how he carves up the company's cash flow and what he sees as the company's enduring advantages.
itunes:title: Kinder Morgan And DCF 2.0
itunes:author: Seeking Alpha
itunes:subtitle: A last look to understand the cash flow behind Kinder Morgan's natural gas flows
